snippet: Jason Bay, who was signed through the end of the 2013 season and had a $3 million buyout clause for 2014, had three hugely disappointing years with the Mets.
abstract: New York Mets and outfielder Jason Bay reach agreement for early expiration of his contract, granting him unrestricted free agency; exact terms of deal have not yet been disclosed.

byline.contributor: Jorge Arangure Jr. contributed reporting from Indian Wells.

lead_paragraph: Jason Bay, who was signed through the end of the 2013 season and had a $3 million buyout clause for 2014, had three hugely disappointing years with the Mets.

headline.seo: Mets and Jason Bay Agree to Part Ways
headline.main: After Three Seasons of Failure, Bay and the Mets Go Their Separate Ways
headline.print_headline: After Three Seasons of Failure, Bay and the Mets Go Their Separate Ways
